content: Ngoc Khanh Nguyen | King's College London Skip to main contentDr Ngoc Khanh Nguyen Lecturer in CryptographyResearch interestsComputer scienceContact detailsngoc_khanh.nguyen@kcl.ac.ukBiographyNgoc Khanh Nguyen is a Lecturer (Assistant Professor) in Cryptography in the Department of Informatics at King's College London. Previously, he was a post-doc at EPFL in Lausanne Switzerland, hosted by Alessandro Chiesa. Khanh obtained his PhD at ETH Zurich and IBM Research Europe - Zurich, under the supervision of Vadim Lyubashevsky and Dennis Hofheinz.
